title: Ban the name asdasdasdasdasd
body:
> by 0xcd15d83f42179b9a5b515eea0975f554444a9646

Should the name asdasdasdasdasd be added to the Denied Names list, banning it from Decentraland?

## Description

Ban a name
Banning a name prevents the use of abusive or offensive names for avatars and scenes.

**[Vote on this proposal on the Decentraland DAO](https://localhost:8000/proposal/?id=b2a5ae80-41a3-11ec-8e4c-4b51c25e2b7d)**
author: 0x2Ba0352480bd1Ea073A83e6639b06362131894CE
